My New Years Resolutions

Jan 1, 2015
1 minute read

Here are my new years resolutions (hold me to them). Some of them were mentioned in my previous post:

  1. Read more: My goal is to read 30 books in 2015.
  2. Write more: I do not want to put an exact number to this, but I want to continue to contribute to Medium, Meet the Founder, and this blog.
  3. Exercise, sleep, and eat well: My goal is to workout 192 days(around 4 days a week). I need to try and shoot for a regular sleep schedule, and not eat out as much.
  4. Continue contributing to github, and writing code every day.
  5. I want to improve on my time management, and become less of a procrastinator.

This is the first time Iâ€™ve actually made a new years resolution, and I plan to stick to it!

Thank you for reading my post. If you have any questions, or want to talk feel free to email me, or reach out to me on twitter.
